apollo.datasets.loaders.ga_power.open_mb007¶

apollo.datasets.loaders.ga_power.open_mb007(*cols, group=2017, data_dir='./data/GA-POWER')[source]¶

Open a Georgia Power target file.

The data must have been previously preprocessed into a CSV file named mb-007.{group}.log where {group} is an arbitrary identifier for the data.

Parameters:
  • *cols (str or int) – The columns to read from the file. These may be names or indices. The reftime column (0) will always be read.
  • group (Any) – An identifier for the file to read.
  • data_dir (pathlib.Path or str) – A path to the directory containing the data.
Returns:

xarray.Dataset – The dataset giving the targets.
